name: Tank Blast
description: Bright and hardcore return of arcade tanks! Thunderous explosions and exciting gameplay await you on colorful levels, which are full of dastardly enemies with clever AI! Well, can you get to the end?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (latest SP) or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
